title: (x) Welcome Back, Kotter rounded sans - Frankfurter {Mark Thoni}
content:
I've looked at all the rounded faces, popular and obscure...still trying to find this one. Any help, please!!!

Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820062649im_/http:/typophile.com/files/wbk_4088.jpg)
author: jlusby

comments.content:
At first glance it appears to be Frankfurter Normal.

[www.linotype.com/462/frankfurter-family.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820062649/http:/www.linotype.com/462/frankfurter-family.html "www.linotype.com/462/frankfurter-family.html")
Ah, close enough for me! Thank you!!!
Oh and thanks for putting that theme song in my head.
